attributes.action: The Government must offer the UK for a new vote  on the decision leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: It will take a brave country and its people to realise there is a mistake here. Jobs have already been lost, confidence in this Country as a major player in the world has been lost, difficulties in travel and work are already affected, the future of the next generation abilitity to see this Europe and this World.  The majority of people have seen sense in this and the MPs must listen.
attributes.background: Members of Parliament or not now acting the best interests of their constituents. Now facts have become clear about the future effects on the country relating to all sectors it is clear that this Country is already suffering from the decision to opt out and needs looking at again in light new info.
